name: .H5M File Extension
summary: Learn about .H5M files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To use an H5M file with Heroes of Might and Magic V (versions 1.3 and above), place the file in the game's Maps directory. The next time you load Heroes of Might and Magic V, you'll be able to select the map your H5M file contains.

In some cases, you may want to view and/or edit an H5M file's contents. To do so, rename the file to use the .ZIP extension and decompress it as you would any ZIP archive. To repackage your decompressed H5M file's contents, zip them up and rename the resulting ZIP file to use the .h5m extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
